item.title: Sorting is FUN
item.description: Since few artist friends of mine want to learn about computer programming, thus we formed a small python learning group, we call it PyClub, in our office. Recently at our PyClub, I introduced some sorting algorithms by demonstrating with poker cards. It’s especially fun for all of us to sort a deck of cards manually with quicksort algorithm, and we all felt the power of divide-and-conquer at that moment! However, the pseudo codes are not easy for my artist friends to memorize the algorithms, so I tried to find some other resources about the visualization of sorting algorithms.
